Description: CALL OR TEXT G-BRAT’S GUITARS ANYTIME; (972)816-7736 You are looking at a 2003 Fender Stratocaster American Vintage 1956 reissue, with a transparent white blonde finish and a Maple fretboard! The action is fast and low... and she sounds like a great Strat should! If you are a fan of vintage Strats but you don’t have tons of $$ to throw down, this is the ticket! Just a great axe with it's whole life ahead! She's 100% original and ready to rock! Here is the lowdown on the features: * Model Name: Stratocaster American Vintage 1956* Series: American Vintage Series* Body: Ash* Neck: Maple, V shape, Nitrocellulose lacquer finish* Color: Trans white blonde, nitrocellulose lacquer finish* Fingerboard: Maple, 7.25” radius (184 mm)* Frets: 21, vintage style* Scale Length: 25.5” (648 mm)* Nutwidth: 1.650” (42 mm)* Hardware: Chrome* Bridge: 6 saddle American vintage synchronized tremolo, with trem bar* Pickguard: Single-ply, white, 8-hole* Pickups: 3 American Vintage single-coil Strat* Controls: Master volume, tone 1 (neck Pickup), tone 2 (middle pickup), and 5-way switch* Machine Heads: Fender/Gotoh vintage style* Weight 8.2 lbs.* Serial # V145832 She was born in 2003 and has been played, but well cared for. There are some mild surface scratches throughout, some mark on the finish surrounding the lower strap peg, and some reddish discoloration on the back edge, along with a few minor nicks. The guitar really does have a very nice appearance despite these minor flaws. The neck is straight, with no cracks or repairs... the frets show some wear, but still have plenty of life ahead of them... and she sounds like a great vintage Strat! Also included is the original Fender tweed hard shell case, and even includes all of the case candy and tremolo bar, just as shown in the last picture! Whoever brings this baby home is gonna be STOKED!! LET'S GO!! If you have any questions, please call anytime at; (972)816-7736 WHILE YOU ARE HERE, GO AHEAD AND LOOK AT MY OTHER AUCTIONS!! OUR CLIENTS ARE THE BEST IN THE WORLD!! Me- I have a 100% positive feedback rating, and intend to keep it that way! So please don't worry! You're in good hands here!! Shipping- We take pride in packing our guitars well, and shipping them quickly. Please note, if you are paying with Pay Pal, we will only ship to the address that is listed in Pay Pal. Here are the shipping rates, covering the planet earth:USA - $59 with UPSCanada, Hawaii, Alaska, Puerto Rico - $119Brazil, Argentina - $179Australia, New Zealand, Switzerland - $249 USPS Express or $349 UPSAll Other Worldwide Shipping - $219 - UPS Worldwide Expedited (in most cases); However, if UPS is more costly in certain countries, USPS will then be used instead. Payment Methods- Pay Pal is preferred!! We do also accept direct payment with Mastercard, Visa, American Express and even Discover! ~ TEXAS RESIDENTS ARE REQUIRED TO ADD 8.25% SALES TAX ~ Factory Warranty- We are an authorized dealer for: Knaggs, Ken Smith, F Bass, Warwick, Trussart, Breedlove and Warrior, so for these instruments, if listed as NEW, there is a full factory warranty. For all other brands, or if listed as USED, there is no warranty available Return Policy- We do accept returns up to 14 days from the point of the initial sale, which means that the guitar must be back in our possession within this 14 day period. However, please be aware of the following conditions: If for any reason you wish to return the guitar, just call or email me directly, within 24 hours of your receiving the item, and let me know that you want to return it. Once we receive the guitar back, in the same condition, you will receive a refund, less a $50 restock fee. Also be aware that the initial shipping fee is not refundable under any circumstances. International Bidders- We, at G-Brat's Guitars, are HONORED to do business with anybody on the planet earth... So international buyers are VERY welcome here! That being said, please observe the following conditions: If you are paying with Pay Pal, please be completely registered with Pay Pal, prior to the purchase; this will help avoid shipment delays, and will assure that you will get your guitar as quickly as possible!International shipments usually require additional "Customs Fees" or "Import Taxes".
